summary: Ursine Armor Pack contains three craftable armors. Imperial, Stormcloak and Barbarian. All have a variety of customization options and can be upgraded using the workbench. Their stats are equal with scale armor plus some extra protection from a few extra parts.
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#EBF1DD][size=4][i][font=Times New Roman][img]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1405234165.jpg[/img]
[img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1412459723.png[/img]

The HDT version of the mod requires [b]HDT High Heels System[/b]. Get it [b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36213/?]here[/url][/b]!

The crafting manuals need to be in the inventory for the recipes to appear in the blacksmith forges!

[img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-2-1412459723.png[/img]

Ursine Armor Pack contains three craftable armors. Imperial, Stormcloak and Barbarian. All have a variety of customization options and can be upgraded using the workbench. Their stats are equal to scale armor plus some extra protection from a few extra parts.

[img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1412462830.png[/img]
[youtube]2CRMnDcXuuw[/youtube] [youtube]B6PvDii7EhU[/youtube]
[youtube]QZLG9UykOVY[/youtube]

[img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-3-1412459723.png[/img]

This is the first mod of a series that will contain eight armors with three variations each. I came up with the idea when I saw the Minidresses Collection mod by Tiwa44 who did an awesome job converting some of the long dresses to mini versions. So I started experimenting with his meshes to see if it's possible to convert them into mini armors and I came up with some very creative results.

These armors will not offer any protection in real life so don't use them at home! Also some variations may be sexy-mini-tiny-skimpy.

There is no guarantee that I will finish all the armors but the creation has been fun so far and as long as I'm excited about this project I'll keep working on it until hopefully all armors are complete.

Below are the eight different mini dresses by Tiwa44 and the progress I'm making with the armors. I'll update the image every time something major changes. Also I came up with the names (with the help of a generator) and to my knowledge they are not used by anyone else.

[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/61012-1-1442736357.jpg[/img]

[img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1412460420.png[/img]
The crafting manuals need to be in the inventory for the recipes to appear in the blacksmith forges!
[img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-2-1412744593.png[/img]
[img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-3-1412744594.png[/img]
[img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1412744593.png[/img]
[img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-5-1412459723.png[/img]

1.0
Release

2.0
Removed the box from Whiterun
All armors are now craftable
Reduced stats from Dragonscale to Scaled armor
"Advanced Armors" perk is now needed for maximum upgrade
Balanced all the stats
Compressed some of the textures to increase performance

[img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1412462830.png[/img]
[youtube]XnJz0Z5H02k[/youtube] [youtube]jQAmac1gUeY[/youtube]
Thank You!

[img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1413848639.png[/img]

- German Translation

[img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1412746639.png[/img]

A beautiful CBBE conversion!
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58648/?]Ursine Armor Pack - CBBE by Mitosuke[/url]

An impressive 7B conversion!
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56632/?]Ursine Armor Pack 7B by Robton[/url]

A great replacer mod for the female soldiers:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56170/?]Ursine Armor - Stormcloak and Imperial soldiers replacer - UNP by PeCool[/url]

The non-HDT version of the mod is also included in:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24684/?]UNP Clothing Merchants by Foaman[/url]

UNPB Versions:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69709/?]MiniArmorsCollection - UNPB by gutris1[/url]

[img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-3-1412746640.png[/img]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36213/?]HDT HighHeels System by hydrogensayshdt[/url] for the HDT version.

[img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-2-1412746640.png[/img]

Using HDT Version without HDT High Heels System the game will crash.
Due to the many transparencies of the armors, blood spills appear in places they shouldn't.
One workaround is to use the mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60/?]Enhanced Blood Textures[/url] and set the wounds duration to a minimum.
If you are using HDT HighHeels System and you see weird numbers at the top left of your screen disable the debug info as shown below.

[img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1401335443.jpg[/img] [img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1405232089.jpg[/img]

[img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1412507195.png[/img]
a) Using the nexus mod manager
b) Manual by extracting the contents of the compressed file in the Skyrim/Data folder
[b]Important![/b] You can only have one of the two versions installed. If you want to switch between HDT and Non HDT then uninstall the one you are currently using.

[img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-2-1412507195.png[/img]
a) Using the nexus mod manager
b) Manual by deleting Ursine Armor.esp from the Skyrim/Data folder
and by deleting the folders that have the word [b]Ursine[/b] inside the Skyrim/Data/Textures/DX/MiniArmorsCollection/ and Skyrim/Data/Meshes/DX/MiniArmorsCollection/ folders.

[img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-3-1412460007.png[/img]
Body: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/?]DIMONIZED UNP female body by dimon99[/url]
Face: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35474/?]The Ningheim Race by Seren4XX HelloSanta Urshi and co[/url]
Eyes: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54416/?]Eye Normal Map Fix by Mr Dave[/url]
Textures: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52841/?]Freckle Mania by tetrodoxin[/url]
Hair: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?]ApachiiSkyHair by Apachii[/url]
Weapons: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24909/?]aMidianBorn Book of Silence by CaBaL- EmeraldReign-the AMB team[/url]
ENB: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30936/?]RealVision ENB by SkyrimTuner[/url] heavily modified :3

[img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1412460007.png[/img]
If you want to use any of the non vanilla meshes of this mod please credit/contact the original creators listed bellow. Anything else you can use freely as long as you credit my work in the comments.

[img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-2-1412460007.png[/img]
Armor meshes [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/47376/?]UNP Minidresses Collection by Tiwa44[/url]
"Half" Bra mesh [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/20415/?]Brokefoots UNP Mashup Compilation by brokefoot[/url]
Armlets and Barbarian Cloak meshes [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/18008/?]Ashara Princes of the Woods for UNP and male by SydneyB[/url]
Cuisse mesh [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24444/?]UNP Undies by Petrovich[/url]
Underwear mesh [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/14294/?]Osare Underwear - UNP by anano[/url]
Collar mesh [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15529/?]R18Pn Set - Inner Wear Set for UNP and CBBEV3 by NPR[/url]

Many thanks to:

TKHBMVP for the German translation! [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4827500/?tb=mods&pUp=1]Nexus Resources[/url], [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=298040664] Steam Resources[/url]

Bethesda that made all this possible.

[img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-2-1408663682.jpg[/img]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68653/?][img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/61012-0-1439287909.jpg[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/67952/?][img]http://static-8.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/61012-1-1437281401.jpg[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/67595/?][img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/61012-1-1436265048.jpg[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/67180/?][img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/61012-0-1435216507.jpg[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/66967/?][img]http://static-8.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/61012-0-1434516218.jpg[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61013/?][img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/61012-2-1419535175.jpg[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60195/?][img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1416902361.jpg[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59451/?][img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1415093656.jpg[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59202/?][img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1413866635.jpg[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58704/?][img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1412409808.jpg[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58205/?][img]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1410911872.jpg[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57909/?][img]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-5-1410097182.jpg[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56998/?][img]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-2-1408006976.jpg[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55924/?][img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1408006976.jpg[/img][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54423/?][img]http://static author: Deserter X

files.name: A. Ursine Armor Pack UNP HDT
files.changelogHtml:
Removed the box from Whiterun
All armors are now craftable
Reduced stats from Dragonscale to Scale armor
"Advanced Armors" perk is now needed for maximum upgrade
Balanced all the stats
Compressed some of the textures to increase performance

files.name: B. Ursine Armor Pack UNP
files.changelogHtml: Added the missing boots to the non-HDT version.
